template.name: nvrjs supporting flow

labels.label: NVRJS data APIs: returns data to nvrjs
MediaMTX webhooks: updates mango based on info from mediamtx

entry.key: Attributes to add to the HTTP Response (Regex)

value.name: Attributes to add to the HTTP Response (Regex)

entry.key: Attributes to add to the HTTP Response (Regex)

entry.value: SELECT json_agg(json_build_object('Date',date,'Name',name,'SensorID',sensorid,'EventID',eventid,'CameraID',cameraid)) as events FROM nvr_event WHERE cameraID = '${http.query.param.CameraID}' AND date BETWEEN ${http.query.param.Start} AND ${http.query.param.End};
